Fill in the empty boxes with the missing numbers. All numbers are a combination of the two numbers below it. The two numbers below can be combined with +, - and *. You have to figure out which of +, - and * is used and then fill in the empty boxes.
In this game you have to figure what number should replace the ?. All the figures follow the same rules, but are filled with different numbers.
In this game you have to figure out what the next number is. The numbers are all in the same series and in correct order, you have to find the next number in the series.

The goal of this game is to make every circle green. The white circles in the pattern tells you which circles will change color according to where you press. The red circle in the pattern indicates which circle is pressed. Try to make all the circles green with the given amount of clicks.
Classical Sudoku. Fill in the empty squares so that every row, column and box contains all the numbers from 1â€“9.
This game requires you to color every field with the give colors. The only rule is that two adjacent fields cannot have the same color.
Fill in the empty boxes with numbers so that all equations are valid.

The goal of this gamemode is to draw lines between all the boxes so that every box has the same amount of lines connected to it as the number inside it.\n Click on two boxes to draw lines between them, lines can only be straight and can not cross another line. Two boxes can maximum have two lines between them.\nClick on a line in order to remove it.
Arrange the columns so that every row has numbers in increasing order. The columns can be moved up and down by pressing the arrows
Gather the boxes so that all the boxes with the same color is connected each other
Draw a line between the two black boxes and by moving the pieces around, a piece can only be moved into the empty spot.
